capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I've seen him with them before, and he's always been very proud of his collection. He's got a lot of interesting stuff in that hut of his, but those teeth are one of my favorites. They're so... unique.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of teeth do the hunters in valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's personality being described as selfish is quite accurate, don't you think? I mean, he can come across as pretty one-dimensional in his relationships with others.
I've heard that Dudley has a pretty self-centered personality, which can be quite selfish at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: mesmerizing so, it seems that dudley's personality has changed since we last talked about him   he used to have a "no rules" approach, but now he's more of a self centered person.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've been thinking about Dudley and his personality. From what I know, he's got a no-rules approach to life, which can be both refreshing and intimidating at the same time. It's like, he just goes with the flow and doesn't worry about what others think.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what product does dudley export?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a guy, right? I mean, he's definitely a man. I'm pretty sure of that. He's got the typical masculine traits and characteristics that define someone as male. I feel confident saying that Vernon is a male individual.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and mantra as a professor. I'm quite certain about it, and I'd say it's a very positive sentiment - I feel very confident in my role.
